properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Will you be an overcomer? Christ is calling now! Will you then forever follow, Though you know not how?{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Yes, we’ll all be overcomer! Yes, we’ll make this choice! Christ is calling, Christ is calling, We have heard His voice!{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Will you be an overcomer? To the Lord be drawn. Keep the first love, never leave it, Till the break of dawn.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Will you be an overcomer? Testimony bear. Keep away from false religion, “Hidden Manna” share.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Will you be an overcomer? Trust the Living Lord! Keep your garments from the deadness, Win the life-reward.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Will you be an overcomer? Never lukewarm be, Ne’er content with what you’ve gotten, More you need to see.{/lang-eng}
